name: Dodge The Cars!
description:
# How to Play

Use the arrow keys to move around.

#Rules

The intention of this game is to dodge the vehicles coming at you. They will not stop until destroyed by letting them collide with each other or environmental objects.

Try to survive as long as you can! And post your score in the comments!

Bike - 1 hitpoint and fast speed

Car - 2 hitpoints and moderate speed

Truck - 3 hitpoints and slow speed

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why?

This is my first game created with the Godot engine.

This started out as a learning project to understand the Godot engine.

It is my version of the Dodge the Creeps! game from: Your first game — Godot Engine (stable) documentation in English

Credits to Kenney - itch.io for his awesome asset packs.
